title: Parent and child relationship defined
context: [ยง584-1] Parent and child relationship defined. As used in this chapter, &ldquo;parent and child relationship&rdquo; includes the legal relationship existing between a child and the child&rsquo;s natural mother, between a child and father whose relationship as parent and child is established under this chapter, or between a child and the child&rsquo;s adoptive parents, incident to which the law confers or imposes rights, privileges, duties, and obligations. [L 1975, c 66, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985] Attorney General Opinions Cited in discussion of hanai children. Att. Gen. Op. 93-1. Case Notes By their plain language, ยง584-3 and this section do not state that this chapter is the exclusive means by which paternity must be established; thus, this chapter is not the exclusive means by which a determination of paternity can be made. 99 H. 1, 52 P.3d 255.
